short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension with alias/window sync along with quality of life improvements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** Unofficial Sync Tool for SlaveHack2 **

*Features
- Aliases saving, syncing, editing, deleting
- Window position saving and syncing
- Common game issue utilities (reset terminal, clear history, etc..)
- New Feature! Calculate maximum BTC you can purchase when selecting a bank account

*Usage
- Export from SH2 to Chrome
- Import from Chrome to SH2
